00013 Design::Design(QDomDocument& doc):
00014 LibraryComponent(doc), 
00015 componentInstances_(),
00016 interconnections_(), 
00017 hierConnections_(),
00018 adHocConnections_(),
00019 attributes_() {
00020 
00021         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->setType(VLNV::DESIGN);
00022 
00023     QDomNodeList nodes = doc.childNodes();
00024 
00025     int i;
00026     for (i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
00027         if (nodes.at(i).nodeName() == "spirit:design")
00028             break;
00029     }
00030     nodes = nodes.at(i).childNodes();
00031 
00032     for (int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
00033         QDomNode node = nodes.at(i);
00034 
00035         if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:componentInstances") {
00036             QDomNodeList instanceNodes = node.childNodes();
00037             for (int i = 0; i < instanceNodes.size(); i++) {
00038                 QDomNode instanceNode = instanceNodes.at(i);
00039                 componentInstances_.append(ComponentInstance(instanceNode));
00040             }
00041         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:interconnections") {
00042             QDomNodeList interconnectionNodes = node.childNodes();
00043             for (int i = 0; i < interconnectionNodes.size(); i++) {
00044                 QDomNode interconnectionNode = interconnectionNodes.at(i);
00045                 if (interconnectionNode.nodeName() == "spirit:interconnection")
00046                 {
00047                     interconnections_.append(Interconnection(interconnectionNode));
00048                 } else {
00049                     // TODO spirit::monitorInterconnection
00050                 }
00051             }
00052         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:adHocConnections") {
00053             QDomNodeList adHocNodes = node.childNodes();
00054             for (int i = 0; i < adHocNodes.size(); i++) {
00055                 QDomNode adHocNode = adHocNodes.at(i);
00056                 adHocConnections_.append(AdHocConnection(adHocNode));
00057             }
00058         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:hierConnections") {
00059             QDomNodeList hierConnectionNodes = node.childNodes();
00060             for (int i = 0; i < hierConnectionNodes.size(); i++) {
00061                 QDomNode hierConnectionNode = hierConnectionNodes.at(i);
00062                 hierConnections_.append(HierConnection(hierConnectionNode));
00063             }
00064         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:vendorExtensions") {
00065             parseVendorExtensions(node);
00066         }
00067     }
00068 }

00150 Design::ComponentInstance::ComponentInstance(
00151     QDomNode& componentInstanceNode)
00152     : instanceName(), displayName(), description(), componentRef(),
00153       configurableElementValues(), portPositions(), mcapiNodeID(-1), endpointsExpanded(false), imported(false)
00154 {
00155     QDomNodeList nodes = componentInstanceNode.childNodes();
00156     for (int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
00157         QDomNode node = nodes.at(i);
00158 
00159         if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:instanceName") {
00160             instanceName = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00161         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:displayName") {
00162             displayName = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00163         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:description") {
00164             description = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00165         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:componentRef") {
00166             componentRef = General::createVLNV(node, VLNV::COMPONENT);
00167         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:configurableElementValues") {
00168             for (int i = 0; i < node.childNodes().size(); i++) {
00169                 QDomNode confNode = node.childNodes().at(i);
00170 
00171                 QString value = confNode.firstChild().nodeValue();
00172 
00173                 QDomNamedNodeMap attributes = confNode.attributes();
00174                 QString reference = 
00175                     attributes.namedItem("spirit:referenceId").nodeValue();
00176                 configurableElementValues.insert(reference, value);
00177             }
00178         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:vendorExtensions") {
00179             for (int i = 0; i < node.childNodes().size(); ++i)
00180             {
00181                 QDomNode childNode = node.childNodes().at(i);
00182 
00183                 if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:position")
00184                 {
00185                     QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = childNode.attributes();
00186                     position.setX(attributeMap.namedItem("x").nodeValue().toInt());
00187                     position.setY(attributeMap.namedItem("y").nodeValue().toInt());
00188                 }
00189                 else if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:portPositions")
00190                 {
00191                     parsePortPositions(childNode);
00192                 }
00193                 else if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:mcapiNodeId")
00194                 {
00195                     mcapiNodeID = childNode.attributes().namedItem("value").nodeValue().toInt();
00196                 }
00197                 else if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:endpointsExpanded")
00198                 {
00199                     endpointsExpanded = true;
00200                 }
00201                 else if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:imported")
00202                 {
00203                     imported = true;
00204                 }
00205             }
00206         }
00207     }
00208 }

00247 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00248 // Function: parsePortPositions()
00249 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00250 void Design::ComponentInstance::parsePortPositions(QDomNode& node)
00251 {
00252     for (int i = 0; i < node.childNodes().size(); ++i)
00253     {
00254         QDomNode childNode = node.childNodes().at(i);
00255 
00256         if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:portPosition")
00257         {
00258             QString name = childNode.attributes().namedItem("kactus2:busRef").nodeValue();
00259             QPointF pos;
00260 
00261             if (childNode.childNodes().size() > 0 &&
00262                 childNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeName() == "kactus2:position")
00263             {
00264                 QDomNode posNode = childNode.childNodes().at(0);
00265                 pos.setX(posNode.attributes().namedItem("x").nodeValue().toInt());
00266                 pos.setY(posNode.attributes().namedItem("y").nodeValue().toInt());
00267             }
00268 
00269             portPositions[name] = pos;
00270         }
00271     }
00272 }

00301 Design::Interconnection::Interconnection(QDomNode &interconnectionNode)
00302     : name(), displayName(), description(),
00303       interface1(QString(), QString()), interface2(QString(), QString())
00304 {
00305     QDomNodeList nodes = interconnectionNode.childNodes();
00306 
00307     for (int i = 0; i < nodes.size(); i++) {
00308         QDomNode node = nodes.at(i);
00309 
00310         if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:name") {
00311             name = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00312         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:displayName") {
00313             displayName = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00314         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:description") {
00315             description = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00316         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:activeInterface") {
00317             if (interface1.componentRef.isNull())
00318                 interface1 = Interface(node);
00319             else
00320                 interface2 = Interface(node);
00321         } // TODO: spirit:monitoredActiveInterface spirit:monitorInterface
00322     }
00323 }

00357 Design::HierConnection::HierConnection(QDomNode &hierConnectionNode)
00358     : interfaceRef(), interface_(QString(""), QString("")), position()
00359 {
00360     QDomNamedNodeMap attributes = hierConnectionNode.attributes();
00361 
00362     interfaceRef = attributes.namedItem("spirit:interfaceRef").nodeValue();
00363 
00364     for (int i = 0; i < hierConnectionNode.childNodes().size(); i++) {
00365         QDomNode node = hierConnectionNode.childNodes().at(i);
00366 
00367         if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:interface")
00368             interface_ = Interface(node);
00369         else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:vendorExtensions")
00370         {
00371             for (int i = 0; i < node.childNodes().size(); ++i)
00372             {
00373                 QDomNode childNode = node.childNodes().at(i);
00374 
00375                 if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:position")
00376                 {
00377                     QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = childNode.attributes();
00378                     position.setX(attributeMap.namedItem("x").nodeValue().toInt());
00379                     position.setY(attributeMap.namedItem("y").nodeValue().toInt());
00380                 }
00381                 else if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:direction")
00382                 {
00383                     QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = childNode.attributes();
00384                     direction.setX(attributeMap.namedItem("x").nodeValue().toInt());
00385                     direction.setY(attributeMap.namedItem("y").nodeValue().toInt());
00386                 }
00387                 else if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:route")
00388                 {
00389                     // Parse the route.
00390                     for (int i = 0; i < childNode.childNodes().size(); ++i)
00391                     {
00392                         QDomNode posNode = childNode.childNodes().at(i);
00393                         QPointF pos;
00394 
00395                         if (posNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:position")
00396                         {
00397                             pos.setX(posNode.attributes().namedItem("x").nodeValue().toInt());
00398                             pos.setY(posNode.attributes().namedItem("y").nodeValue().toInt());
00399                             route.append(pos);
00400                         }
00401                     }
00402                 }
00403             }
00404         }
00405     }
00406 }

00437 Design::PortRef::PortRef(QDomNode &portReferenceNode)
00438     : portRef(), componentRef(), left(-1), right(-1)
00439 {
00440     QDomNamedNodeMap attributes = portReferenceNode.attributes();
00441 
00442     portRef = attributes.namedItem("spirit:portRef").nodeValue();
00443 
00444     if (portReferenceNode.nodeName() == "spirit:internalPortReference")
00445         componentRef = attributes.namedItem("spirit:componentRef").nodeValue();
00446 
00447     if (attributes.contains("spirit:left"))
00448         left = attributes.namedItem("spirit:left").nodeValue().toInt();
00449     if (attributes.contains("spirit:right"))
00450         right = attributes.namedItem("spirit:right").nodeValue().toInt();
00451 }

00479 Design::AdHocConnection::AdHocConnection(QDomNode &adHocConnectionNode)
00480     : name(), displayName(), description(), tiedValue(),
00481       internalPortReferences(), externalPortReferences()
00482 {
00483     for (int i = 0; i < adHocConnectionNode.childNodes().size(); i++) {
00484         QDomNode node = adHocConnectionNode.childNodes().at(i);
00485 
00486         if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:name") {
00487             name = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00488         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:displayName") {
00489             displayName = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00490         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:description") {
00491             description = node.firstChild().nodeValue();
00492         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:internalPortReference") {
00493             internalPortReferences.append(PortRef(node));
00494         } else if (node.nodeName() == "spirit:externalPortReference") {
00495             externalPortReferences.append(PortRef(node));
00496         }
00497     }
00498 
00499     QDomNamedNodeMap attributes = adHocConnectionNode.attributes();
00500 
00501     if (attributes.contains("spirit:tiedValue")) {
00502         tiedValue = attributes.namedItem("spirit:tiedValue").nodeValue();
00503     }
00504 }

00584 
00585 const QList<VLNV> Design::getDependentVLNVs() const
00586 {
00587     QList<VLNV> instanceList;
00588 
00589     // go through all component instances within the design
00590     for (int i = 0; i < this->componentInstances_.size(); ++i) {
00591 
00592         // if the pointer is valid and it is not already added to the list of
00593         // component instances (two instances of same component are not added
00594         // twice)
00595         if ((this->componentInstances_.at(i).componentRef.isValid()) &&
00596             (!instanceList.contains(componentInstances_.at(i).componentRef))) {
00597 
00598             // add the component VLNV to the list
00599             instanceList.append(componentInstances_.at(i).componentRef);
00600         }
00601     }
00602     return instanceList;
00603 }
00604 
00605 void Design::write(QFile& file)
00606 {
00607     QXmlStreamWriter xmlWriter(&file);
00608 
00609     xmlWriter.setAutoFormatting(true);
00610     xmlWriter.setAutoFormattingIndent(-1);
00611 
00612     LibraryComponent::write(xmlWriter);
00613 
00614         // set the attributes
00615         setXMLNameSpaceAttributes(attributes_);
00616 
00617         // write the attributes for the spirit:designConfiguration element
00618         General::writeAttributes(xmlWriter, attributes_);
00619 
00620     LibraryComponent::writeVLNV(xmlWriter);
00621 
00622     if (!componentInstances_.isEmpty()) {
00623         xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:componentInstances");
00624 
00625         foreach (ComponentInstance inst, componentInstances_) {
00626             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:componentInstance");
00627 
00628             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:instanceName",
00629                 inst.instanceName);
00630             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName",
00631                 inst.displayName);
00632             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:description",
00633                 inst.description);
00634             xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("spirit:componentRef");
00635             General::writeVLNVAttributes(xmlWriter,
00636                 &inst.componentRef);
00637 
00638             QMapIterator<QString, QString> i(inst.configurableElementValues);
00639             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:configurableElementValues");
00640             while (i.hasNext()) {
00641                 i.next();
00642 
00643                 xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:configurableElementValue");
00644                 xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:referenceId", i.key());
00645                 xmlWriter.writeCharacters(i.value());
00646                 xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00647             }
00648 
00649             xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00650 
00651             // Write custom data to vendor extensions.
00652             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:vendorExtensions");
00653 
00654             // Write the component position.
00655             writePosition(xmlWriter, inst.position);
00656 
00657             // Write the port positions.
00658             QMapIterator<QString, QPointF> itrPortPos(inst.portPositions);
00659             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("kactus2:portPositions");
00660 
00661             while (itrPortPos.hasNext())
00662             {
00663                 itrPortPos.next();
00664 
00665                 xmlWriter.writeStartElement("kactus2:portPosition");
00666                 xmlWriter.writeAttribute("kactus2:busRef", itrPortPos.key());
00667                 writePosition(xmlWriter, itrPortPos.value());
00668                 xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00669             }
00670 
00671             xmlWriter.writeEndElement(); // kactus2:portPositions
00672 
00673             // Write the MCAPI node ID if specified.
00674             if (inst.mcapiNodeID != -1)
00675             {
00676                 xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("kactus2:mcapiNodeId");
00677                 xmlWriter.writeAttribute("value", QString::number(inst.mcapiNodeID));
00678             }
00679 
00680             if (inst.endpointsExpanded)
00681             {
00682                 xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("kactus2:endpointsExpanded");
00683             }
00684 
00685             if (inst.imported)
00686             {
00687                 xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("kactus2:imported");
00688             }
00689 
00690             xmlWriter.writeEndElement(); // spirit:vendorExtensions
00691             xmlWriter.writeEndElement(); // spirit:componentInstance
00692         }
00693 
00694         xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00695     }
00696 
00697     if (!interconnections_.isEmpty()) {
00698         xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:interconnections");
00699 
00700         foreach (Interconnection inter, interconnections_) {
00701             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:interconnection");
00702 
00703             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:name",
00704                 inter.name);
00705             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName",
00706                 inter.displayName);
00707             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:description",
00708                 inter.description);
00709 
00710             xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("spirit:activeInterface");
00711             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:componentRef",
00712                 inter.interface1.componentRef);
00713             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:busRef",
00714                 inter.interface1.busRef);
00715 
00716             xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("spirit:activeInterface");
00717             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:componentRef",
00718                 inter.interface2.componentRef);
00719             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:busRef",
00720                 inter.interface2.busRef);
00721 
00722             xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00723         }
00724 
00725         xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00726     }
00727 
00728     if (!hierConnections_.isEmpty()) {
00729         xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:hierConnections");
00730 
00731         foreach (HierConnection hier, hierConnections_) {
00732             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:hierConnection");
00733             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:interfaceRef",
00734                 hier.interfaceRef);
00735 
00736             xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("spirit:interface");
00737             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:componentRef",
00738                 hier.interface_.componentRef);
00739             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:busRef",
00740                 hier.interface_.busRef);
00741 
00742             // Write custom data to vendor extensions.
00743             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:vendorExtensions");
00744             writePosition(xmlWriter, hier.position);
00745             writeDirection(xmlWriter, hier.direction);
00746 
00747             if (!hier.route.empty())
00748             {
00749                 xmlWriter.writeStartElement("kactus2:route");
00750 
00751                 foreach (QPointF const& point, hier.route)
00752                 {
00753                     writePosition(xmlWriter, point);
00754                 }
00755 
00756                 xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00757             }
00758 
00759             xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00760 
00761             xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00762         }
00763 
00764         xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00765     }
00766 
00767     if (!adHocConnections_.isEmpty()) {
00768         xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:adHocConnections");
00769 
00770         foreach (AdHocConnection adhoc, adHocConnections_) {
00771             xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:adHocConnection");
00772 
00773             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:name",
00774                 adhoc.name);
00775             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName",
00776                 adhoc.displayName);
00777             xmlWriter.writeTextElement("spirit:description",
00778                 adhoc.description);
00779 
00780             foreach (PortRef portRef, adhoc.internalPortReferences) {
00781                 xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement(
00782                     "spirit:internalPortReference");
00783 
00784                 xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:componentRef",
00785                     portRef.componentRef);
00786                 xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:portRef",
00787                     portRef.portRef);
00788             }
00789 
00790             foreach (PortRef portRef, adhoc.externalPortReferences) {
00791                 xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement(
00792                     "spirit:externalPortReference");
00793 
00794                 xmlWriter.writeAttribute("spirit:portRef",
00795                     portRef.portRef);
00796             }
00797 
00798             xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00799         }
00800 
00801         xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00802     }
00803 
00804     xmlWriter.writeStartElement("spirit:vendorExtensions");
00805 
00806     if (!columns_.isEmpty())
00807     {
00808         xmlWriter.writeStartElement("kactus2:columnLayout");
00809 
00810         foreach (ColumnDesc const& columnDesc, columns_)
00811         {
00812             xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("kactus2:column");
00813             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("name", columnDesc.name);
00814             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("contentType", QString::number(columnDesc.contentType));
00815             xmlWriter.writeAttribute("allowedItems", QString::number(columnDesc.allowedItems));
00816         }
00817 
00818         xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00819 
00820         xmlWriter.writeStartElement("kactus2:routes");
00821 
00822         foreach (Interconnection const& conn, interconnections_)
00823         {
00824             if (!conn.route.empty())
00825             {
00826                 xmlWriter.writeStartElement("kactus2:route");
00827                 xmlWriter.writeAttribute("kactus2:connRef", conn.name);
00828                 
00829                 foreach (QPointF const& point, conn.route)
00830                 {
00831                     writePosition(xmlWriter, point);
00832                 }
00833 
00834                 xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00835             }
00836         }
00837 
00838         xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00839     }
00840    
00841     xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00842 
00843     xmlWriter.writeEndElement();
00844     xmlWriter.writeEndDocument();
00845 }
00846 
00847 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00848 // Function: parseVendorExtensions()
00849 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00850 void Design::parseVendorExtensions(QDomNode &node)
00851 {
00852     QDomNodeList childNodes = node.childNodes();
00853 
00854     for (int i = 0; i < childNodes.size(); i++)
00855     {
00856         QDomNode childNode = childNodes.at(i);
00857 
00858         // If the column layout was found, read the column descriptions.
00859         if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:columnLayout")
00860         {
00861             QDomNodeList columnNodes = childNode.childNodes();
00862 
00863             for (int i = 0; i < columnNodes.size(); ++i)
00864             {
00865                 if (columnNodes.at(i).nodeName() == "kactus2:column")
00866                 {
00867                     columns_.append(ColumnDesc(columnNodes.at(i)));
00868                 }
00869             }
00870         }
00871         // Otherwise read the interconnection routes if they were found.
00872         else if (childNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:routes")
00873         {
00874             QDomNodeList connNodes = childNode.childNodes();
00875 
00876             for (int i = 0; i < connNodes.size(); ++i)
00877             {
00878                 QDomNode connNode = connNodes.at(i);
00879 
00880                 if (connNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:route")
00881                 {
00882                     QString name = connNode.attributes().namedItem("kactus2:connRef").nodeValue();
00883                     QList<QPointF> route;
00884 
00885                     // Parse the route.
00886                     for (int i = 0; i < connNode.childNodes().size(); ++i)
00887                     {
00888                         QDomNode posNode = connNode.childNodes().at(i);
00889                         QPointF pos;
00890 
00891                         if (posNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:position")
00892                         {
00893                             pos.setX(posNode.attributes().namedItem("x").nodeValue().toInt());
00894                             pos.setY(posNode.attributes().namedItem("y").nodeValue().toInt());
00895                             route.append(pos);
00896                         }
00897                     }
00898 
00899                     // Apply the route to the correct interconnection.
00900                     for (int i = 0; i < interconnections_.size(); ++i)
00901                     {
00902                         if (interconnections_[i].name == name)
00903                         {
00904                             interconnections_[i].route = route;
00905                             break;
00906                         }
00907                     }
00908                 }
00909             }
00910         }
00911     }
00912 }
00913 
00914 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00915 // Function: getColumns()
00916 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00917 QList<Design::ColumnDesc> const& Design::getColumns() const
00918 {
00919     return columns_;
00920 }

00922 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00923 // Function: setColumns()
00924 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00925 void Design::setColumns(QList<ColumnDesc> const& columns)
00926 {
00927     columns_ = columns;
00928 }

00930 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00931 // Function: writePosition()
00932 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00933 void Design::writePosition(QXmlStreamWriter& xmlWriter, QPointF const& pos)
00934 {
00935     xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("kactus2:position");
00936     xmlWriter.writeAttribute("x", QString::number(int(pos.x())));
00937     xmlWriter.writeAttribute("y", QString::number(int(pos.y())));
00938 }
00939 
00940 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00941 // Function: writeDirection()
00942 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00943 void Design::writeDirection(QXmlStreamWriter& xmlWriter, QVector2D const& dir)
00944 {
00945     xmlWriter.writeEmptyElement("kactus2:direction");
00946     xmlWriter.writeAttribute("x", QString::number(int(dir.x())));
00947     xmlWriter.writeAttribute("y", QString::number(int(dir.y())));
00948 }

00950 QList<VLNV> Design::getComponents() const {
00951 
00952         QList<VLNV> list;
00953 
00954         foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, componentInstances_) {
00955                 if (instance.componentRef.isValid())
00956                         list.append(instance.componentRef);
00957         }
00958         return list;
00959 }

00961 void Design::setVlnv( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00962         LibraryComponent::setVlnv(vlnv);
00963         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->setType(VLNV::DESIGN);
00964 }
